snippet.title: Candy Mountain Massacre (PC) - Full 1080p60 Game Walkthrough - No Commentary
snippet.description:
The very first Candy Mountain Massacre game, also known as "Candy Mountain Massacre Part 1".

If you enjoyed watching this video, please leave a like and subscribe! I would very much appreciate it!

I found this and its two sequels on BlueMaxima's Flashpoint. Might be nostalgic for some people!

Candy Mountain Massacre Games (PC) playlist:  https://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=PLYwqV0N4djf9H_AvFo1_4m6BnbrCpDfvG

---Also on my channel---
Flash Games playlist: https://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=PLYwqV0N4djf-GyUGcG5jQQj7bBDdHC7Rh
Flash Games (Nickelodeon, Fox Kids, Jetix, Disney XD, Cartoon Network) playlist: https://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=PLYwqV0N4djf_0u30nZwG9Xt9CX0SuPRGR

Story: In Candy's 5 years as an exterminator, she has never seen anything like this. A virulent plague is ravishing the sweet magical creatures of Candy Mountain, turning them into homicidal killers. 

Candy's mission: exterminate. Save the innocent cupcakes from the deadly outbreak to earn extra points.

Release Dates - Before 2013
Genre - First-Person Shooter
Platforms - Shockwave / Flash / Browser
Developer - Mockworld.com
Publisher - Adult Swim

My Xbox gamertag: TGG Yari
My PlayStation gamertag: ToughGamingGuyYT
My Steam: toughgamingguy2

Wanna see more of my fantastic walkthroughs? Give it a go: https://www.youtube.com/user/ToughGamingGuy/playlists
